message.body: Awesome. We're takin her to the grocery and then back to yr place.
I won't be here. I am going to a dinner in center city.

She's def a lot better and really wants to come back, I think physically she's alright...definitely try to keep her eating, she won't eat anything other than yogurt unless you put it in front of her. I'm sending her back with some quinoa and veggies, and
What was her response to the idea of making a report and or contacting the w.a.r Philadelphia
She said she will tomorrow, I think she wanted to be home before doing anything like that
Hey, I'm at yr place with her, she's alright. Please don't mention that I called you, I don't want her to think I'm telling everyone her business, I was just really worried earlier.
I'll call you when I leave
